Author: arabella_05
Text: body dysmorphia is real baby, i still "feel" the same i did when i was at my highest weight (obese bmi) and some days i feel i'm at a healthy size but that lasts for about five seconds and then it's back to thinking i'm huge again :)   however i'm so sorry you feel that way, i really understand the frustration. sometimes it helps for me to take pictures/videos of my body at different angles without my face in it to try visualise my body objectively. it works occasionally.
